vizualisations.label: Mood by day
vizualisations.query: SELECT date, sum(mood) as mood FROM ? GROUP BY date ORDER BY date DESC

vizualisations.label: Mood instability
vizualisations.query: Select date, posmood * negmood / 10 as instability From (SELECT date, sum(CASE when mood>0 then mood else 0 END) as posmood,  sum(CASE when mood<0 then abs(mood) else 0 END) AS negmood FROM ? GROUP BY date ORDER BY date DESC)
